basic.description: This course covers the theory and practice of scientific visualization. Students learn how to use state-of-the-art visualization toolkits, create their own visualization tools, represent both 2-D and 3-D data sets, and evaluate the effectiveness of their visualizations.
basic.subject: ISC
basic.title: Scientific Visualization

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: CGS 4406, ISC 5305, or instructor permission.
